transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan sir Parmeshwar ji baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Ji sir aapka call aaya tha IndiaMART pe kya sir issue aa raha hai leads ko leke?
Customer: Madam leads ko leke ye aapka kuch to call isme farzi aa raha hai sir.
Executive: Farzi call aa raha hai?
Customer: Farzi call aa raha hai.
Executive: Jaise kya bolte hain call jo aa raha hai samne se uski baat kar rahe hain ya fir jo buylead hai uska bol rahe hain?
Customer: Buylead ka bol raha hu madam.
Executive: Achha buylead mein kya bolte hain aap jaise customer se baat kar rahe hain to wo kya bol rahe hain udhar se?
Customer: Customer se baat karte hain.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Customer aise wo kehte hain ki bhai hume ye lena hai ye lena hai wo lete kuch nahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible] ek ton ki.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aap verified customer dijiye na aap aap sare tarbat dal dete hain andar kuch milna hai nahi hai aise dikha dete hain.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir hamari leads to verified rehti hai aapko 10 mein se kitne lead aise mil rahe hain jo is tarah ke hain?
Customer: Madam ek do lead sahi rehti hai baki sare aath aath lead aise chali jati hai 10 mein se.
Executive: Achha to number kya jaise customer mana kar dete hain aisa ho raha hai aapke sath?
Customer: Haan main Sunil ji se bhi baat ki hai jo inhone mujhe ye IndiaMART ka tha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Number baat kariye lead badhaiye madam aise lead do ke fir mujhe kya kaam hai paise waste ho rahe hain aise to customer aa hi nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji nahi bilkul sahi baat hai sir lekin hamare dekhiye 10 mein se ek do lead hum mante hain ki idhar udhar ho sakta hai lekin baki lead to sahi rehti hai sir hai na aisa to nahi hai jaise aap dobara se call back karke unse confirm karte hain client se?
Customer: Bilkul confirm karte hain madam.
Executive: Haan to tab bhi unka yahi same rehta hai ki meri lead nahi hai mujhe nahi chahiye aisa wala.
Customer: Aise kehte hain abhi wo maine kal ek jana ko call lagaya tha kal maine do lead bharti hai.
Customer: Ek lead to chalo sahi aa gayi lead ke andar aaya wo aise ki abhi mere brother ne ye search kiya hume nahi chahiye.
Executive: Achha nahi chahiye aisa tha?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay unke brother ne lekin search kiya tha na unke brother ko to chahiye tha na?
Customer: Unko unko chahiye tha mujhe nahi chahiye abhi un log ab wo brother ka kab se baat kar rahe hain kab kya hai koi issue nahi hai ya to jinko chahiye unke number aapko dalne chahiye adhar ke aap number dal dete ho panch che case aise aa gaye.
Executive: Sir buyer hi apna number dalta hai buyer apne phone se login karta hai aur usi ka hi apna number wo dalta hai tabhi hota hai aisa nahi hai ki hum log number lete hain usse.
Customer: To mera to nuksan hi hua na 28000 ka.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul nahi sir ha nuksan karne ke liye nahi hai sir wahi hai theek hai main ek kaam karti hu aap mujhe batayenge kaun se lead pe ye cheez hui hai jaise aapne ek Payal naam ki client se baat kiya hoga Gandhi Nagar se hain aaj aapne kharida tha ek lead theek hai heena powder ka.
Executive: To ye lead mein bhi aisa hi tha dikkat tha isme?
Customer: Nahi ye ye to chalo abhi theek hai is lead ke andar theek hai main batata hu kaun kaun si lead aayi thi main batata hu aapko.
Executive: Aap mere ko naam bataye taki hum apne team ko complaint dalenge theek hai client ka naam bataye kaun sa ek hai Kebur hai K U likha hua Wardha se.
Customer: To aap kal ke upar jaiye kal.
Executive: Kal.
Customer: Parveen ha Maharashtra ke andar hai.
Executive: Theek hai Latur Praveen hai garlic powder.
Executive: To isme theek hai garlic powder aur sath mein isme likha hai ki red chilli powder bhi chahiye.
Customer: Nahi madam farzi aadmi hai farzi aadmi hai ye.
Executive: Kya kya bolta hai sir ye?
Customer: Ye keh raha hai mujhe nahi mere bhai ko chahiye.
Executive: To aap usse bol rahe hain ki aapka bhai chalata hai kya aapka phone yahan pe dal diya hai.
Customer: Madam isko kya jhagda karo isse kya kya karu maine to aapko paise de main to jhagda kar nahi sakta na.
Executive: Theek hai aapne bataya na ye main apne team ko ye complaint dal deti hu theek hai wo check karke ya to unko block kar diya jayega ya tumse confirmation le liya jayega ki kis tarah ka hai theek hai aur meri ye ek lead waste ho gayi jo?
Executive: Iska main ek aapko reverse kar de rahi hu theek hai sir.
Executive: Ek jo buylead aapki waste hui hai na wo uska ek main reverse kar de rahi hu aur bataye aur kaun sa dikkat hai abhi main kar deti hu aur bataye aur kaun sa isme wrong hai?
Customer: Aur batata hu aap chalu rakhiye mobile.

Customer: Aur ye Bangalore ka hai.
Executive: Bangaluru ka ek minute client ka naam bataye.
Customer: Harish
Executive: Paresh
Customer: Haan inhone kaha bhai humne le liya.
Executive: To isme sir kya galat hai aapne de se usko call kiya hai na ye to theek lead hai.
Customer: Turant sahi baat hai dekh madam ya to wo ab mujhe aap wahi customer dijiye jo kisi ke paas nahi gaya aap sabhi ko baat dete ho fir hamare paas aake kya matlab.
Executive: Nahi nahi kisi ke paas nahi gaya wo wala lead aapko message mein jata hai sir aapke lead manager mein aapko milta rehta hai na wo personally buyer aapko message karta hai kuch hamari team ki taraf se bhi aapko bheja jata hai aapke lead manager mein dikhta hai lekin jo buylead hota hai sir usme to panch log usko kharid sakte hain ye aapko shuru se bataya gaya hai ek buylead ko panch log kharid sakte hain ab aap agar late mein wo lead kharidenge tab tak uska deal ho chuka rahega to kya kar sakte hain theek hai to aap waise aise hote hain kuch aise hote hain ki bhai hume yahi humne jana yahi lena hai panch kilo kilo ke customer aate hain one second ek minute aap hold sakte hain.
Executive: Wo to sir aap ye batao aapke ka aapko se baat kar rahi hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fake buyleads.

- Customer feels money is being wasted.

- Customer wants exclusive leads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to file complaint to team.

- Executive offered to reverse one wasted buylead.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, customer complaints, verification
